706128f-a.title: Brooklyn: Old Mill Road - Fountain Avenue
706128f-a.text:
Old Mill Road, south side, east of Fountain Ave. to Crescent (back-
ground) Street, showing also at a point beyond Crescent Street where one
O1d Mill Road meets the one in this view fgrming a right angle prior to
its continuance southward to the "Red Mill" which is no longer in existence.
July 5, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
706128f-a.folder: Old Mill Road & Fountain Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
